title: Software Engineer
benefits: Employee share and bonus plans; Growth opportunities; CBD location with transport and parking; Discounts on energy and EV subscriptions; Learning and community programs; Paid parental leave and flexible options; Option to purchase additional leave
description: Join Origin Energy to develop and maintain critical IT systems supporting commercial customers and the energy transition.
Work in Agile teams to deliver features and solutions using Java, React, Python, MS SQL, and MongoDB.
Participate in incident management and ensure seamless system operations.
Collaborate across teams, take ownership of your work, and contribute to renewable energy initiatives.
